survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Eco-Friendly Transportation Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding eco-friendly transportation services, including bike-sharing, electric scooters, and carpooling options.

questions.question_text: How often do you use eco-friendly transportation services (e.g., bike-sharing, electric scooters, carpooling)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use eco-friendly transportation services (e.g., bike-sharing, electric scooters, carpooling)?

questions.question_text: Which eco-friendly transportation service do you use most frequently?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: Which eco-friendly transportation service do you use most frequently?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of eco-friendly transportation services? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional factors.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of eco-friendly transportation options in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use eco-friendly transportation services more often?
